label: eta = matter/radiation density
note: Gate 50: Baryon asymmetry from G2 cycle imbalance via leptogenesis. v22.0-12PAIR: chi_eff = 72 (per-shadow), N_eff = 20 = 2*(b3-14). Formula: eta_B = (J/N_eff) * (b3/chi_eff) * sin(delta_CP) * exp(-Re(T)). With J = 3.08e-5 (Jarlskog), b3/chi_eff = 24/72 = 1/3, delta_CP = pi/6, Re(T) = 7.086. Matches Planck 2018: 6.1e-10 +/- 0.04e-10. eta = matter/radiation density
